name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiny Fishing - Relax Game for Chrome Game

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Tiny Fishing Relax Game for Chrome as a Chrome extension, try it now!
short.es: ¡Juega al juego de pesca Tiny Fishing Relax para Chrome como una extensión de Chrome, pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi Tiny Fishing Relax Game Chrome'is Chrome'i laiendusena, proovi kohe järgi!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Tiny Fishing Relax Game para sa Chrome bilang isang Chrome extension, subukan mo ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Tiny Fishing Relax Game sur Chrome en tant qu'extension Chrome, essayez maintenant !
short.he: Tiny Fishing Relax Game for Chrome'ı bir Chrome uzantısı olarak oyna, şimdi dene!
short.hi: Juega al juego de pesca relajante Tiny Fishing para Chrome como una extensión de Chrome, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Játssz a Tiny Fishing Relax Game Chrome-ban elérhető Chrome-bővítményként, próbáld ki most!
short.it: Gioca a Tiny Fishing Relax Game per Chrome come estensione di Chrome, provane subito uno!
short.ja: Chrome拡張機能としてChromeでTiny Fishing Relax Gameをプレイしてみてください！
short.lt: Žaiskite "Tiny Fishing Relax Game" "Chrome" naršyklėje kaip "Chrome" plėtinį, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet spēli Tiny Fishing Relax Chrome kā Chrome paplašinājumu, izmēģiniet to tagad!
short.ms: Jouez à Tiny Fishing Relax Game pour Chrome en tant qu'extension Chrome, essayez-le maintenant !
short.nl: Speel Tiny Fishing Relax Game for Chrome als Chrome-extensie, probeer het nu!
short.no: ¡Juega Tiny Fishing Relax Game for Chrome como una extensión de Chrome, pruébalo ahora!
short.ru: Играйте в игру "Tiny Fishing Relax" для Chrome в качестве расширения Chrome, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Igrajte igro Tiny Fishing Relax Game za Chrome kot razširitev za Chrome, poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Играјte Tiny Fishing Relax Game za Chrome kao Chrome proširenje, isprobajte sada!
short.th: เล่นเกม Tiny Fishing Relax สำหรับ Chrome ในฐานะส่วนขยายของ Chrome ลองเลย!
short.tr: Şimdi Chrome uzantısı olarak Tiny Fishing Relax Oyununu oyna, hemen dene!
short.uk: Jouez au jeu Tiny Fishing Relax pour Chrome en tant qu'extension Chrome, essayez-le maintenant !
short.zh_CN: 立即尝试在 Chrome 上作为 Chrome 扩展程序玩迷你钓鱼休闲游戏！
short.zh_TW: 立即嘗試使用 Chrome 擴充功能程式 Play Tiny Fishing Relax Game for Chrome！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎣 Tiny Fishing - The Ultimate Relaxation Game for Chrome! 🌟

Escape to a serene pixelated world with Tiny Fishing - the ultimate relaxation game that's now available for FREE on the Chrome Web Store! 🆓🌐

🌟 Soothing Features:

🐟 Immerse yourself in tranquil pixel art environments for ultimate relaxation.
🎣 Experience the joy of casual fishing without the need for fancy equipment!
🌈 Customize your tackle box and collect charming pixelated fish!
🎉 Challenge yourself with calming fishing quests and unlock new serene locations!
🚀 Why Choose Tiny Fishing - Relax Game?
Embark on a soothing journey where the simple act of casting a pixelated line becomes an oasis of calm in your hectic day! 🌊🌟

🕹️ How to Play:

🌍 Install Tiny Fishing - Relax Game from the Chrome Web Store.
🎣 Cast your pixelated rod into the waters of tranquility.
🌟 Collect charming fish, customize your tackle box, and unwind with each serene catch! 🚣‍♂️

🌅Play more games on the top left menu
